news_header: A 15-year-old boy has been arrested following a shooting in Fall City, Washington, that left five people dead, including two adults and three teenagers.
news_text: On Monday morning, a shooting at a home near Seattle resulted in the deaths of two adults and three teenagers. A 15-year-old suspect has been taken into custody, with a judge ruling he cannot contact a surviving victim. Reports suggest the victims were parents Mark and Sarah Humiston and their three children. An 11-year-old girl who survived is in satisfactory condition. Police responded to chaotic scenes and arrested the suspect without significant confrontation. The teenager has no prior criminal history, and officials have until Thursday to file charges.
